title: Arrival
summary: Dallas moves in, finds a recording device in the grass, meets Makayla & Asher; they want to borrow his oscillator.

title: Dallas Night
summary: Dallas can't sleep; sees a golden flicker; unpacks Sierra's box; hears the hum; battery dies before he can record.

title: The Hum
summary: Walk to town with Dominic; birds pointed at marsh; streetlight flickers; invited to fellowship lunch.

title: Fellowship
summary: Church picnic; Dallas meets Makayla & Asher properly; Janice hands off Howie.

title: Marsh Walk Later
summary: Marsh boardwalk with Dominic; Merlin app; "movement underneath"—merge candidate with s03.

title: News Vans
summary: Pat on TV; wind gusts, receiver spikes; weird burn marks on Dominic's driveway; Dallas stays to help.

title: The Coordinates
summary: Basement with kids' gear; Mr. Mike scratches numbers into wood; Asher/Makayla get coordinates; Makayla asks to borrow oscillator.

title: Dallas Marsh Walk
summary: Trailcam, waveform ladder, golden flicker; Dallas finds injured creature in hollow; something chases him; he runs out with it. [Plot 1]

title: The Golden Daze
summary: Dominic returns Howie; Dallas analyzes recordings—grid coordinates match Mr. Mike's language; creature in kitchen.

title: Creature Discovery
summary: Howie walk; readings spike toward the house; hum; shadows move against the wind; streetlights black out.

title: The Kitchen Hospital
summary: Dallas at window, creature in kitchen; hum; Dominic/Asher return Howie; lifegroup Thursday at Dallas's.

title: The Burn Mark
summary: Burn mark + crystal in yard; Makayla confronts Dallas; discovers creature; "we can't tell anyone." [Plot 2]

title: Entering Grass
summary: Dominic leaves for Costco; Makayla sees creature, documents it (sketches, not just video). [Plot 2]

title: Creature Dying
summary: Placeholder—return beat; they could bring it back but it doesn't want to go.

title: The Message
summary: Creature fading on second crystal; something heavy approaches; Dallas grabs it and runs.

title: The Escape
summary: Deletion stub; content folded into s12/s13.

title: Makeshift Hospital
summary: Sprint out of grass; creature fading in his coat; "go, go, go"—echo of s08.

title: Entering Grass 2
summary: Kitchen triage; oscilloscope on creature; 115.3 MHz stabilizes it; Makayla: "It's pulling power."

title: Life Group Arrives
summary: Creature hidden; brownouts; Mr. Mike freaks; everyone sees the creature. [Plot 3]

title: Basement Huddle
summary: Crew huddle; "return it"; doorbell—first family for lifegroup. [Plot 3]

title: The Hymn
summary: Hymn rises; hum answers; lights pulse; tea ripples; group settles on "weird weather." [Plot 3]

title: Red Eyes
summary: Makayla finds Sierra's folder; "If Red-Eyes take them out, this is just ghost stories"; decision to return it.

title: Creature Missing
summary: Red eyes at the edge of the yard; creature gone from the box. [Plot 4]

title: Marsh Confrontation
summary: Shoebox empty; burn marks on Janice's minivan; Dallas/Makayla decide to go find it. [Plot 5–6]

title: Predator Attack
summary: Mr. Mike barges in; burn trail; Dallas/Makayla scan; creature's cry; "We have to go get it." First confrontation with dark creatures. [Plot 7]

title: The Perimeter
summary: Gold vs red eyes; paralysis; creature dies in marsh; they retreat; Dominic: "They'll come"; zap episodes; plan hatched. [Plot 8–10]

title: The Last Dinner
summary: Predators turn toward humans; run home; trap set (acoustic corridor); storm. [Plot 11]

title: Final Echoes
summary: Dinner; Makayla bolts into grass; phase cancellation; she records the waveform; creatures retreat. Loss opens path. [Plot 12–13]

title: Aftermath
summary: Town normal; Pat; church picnic; Sierra's folder with kids; Dallas still recording. [Plot 14]
